name: Student Loan Counseling
description: Student loan coaching If you are already out of school, they will first review your current source(s) of income and then look at your student loan debt and any other outstanding debt you may have, such as a mortgage, car loan or credit card debt. If you are still in school or about to enroll, they will look at your financial circumstances-including those of your family, if appropriate-and discuss your expectations for the future to help guide you toward a program that will serve you going forwar
